Key Match Events: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander added 21 points and nine assists
Chet Holmgren added 14 points, nine rebounds and two blocks
Isaiah Joe caught fire and knocked down 3-pointers on three straight possessions
Jalen Suggs had 19 points, six assists and and six rebounds
Goga Bitadze added 11 points and nine rebounds
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Thunder shot 45.9% from the field
Gilgeous-Alexander set a career high with seven assists in the first quarter
The Thunder led 73-57 with 3:33 left in the third quarter
Oklahoma City has won all seven of its games by at least 12 points
Others: Orlando struggled to score, connecting on just 29 of 82 shots (35.4%)
Orlando (3-5) played without injured starters Paolo Banchero and Wendell Carter Jr.
Kentavious Caldwell-Pope was held to six points on 1-for-7 shooting while Anthony Black made 1 of 8 field goals and scored three points
